title: Chapter 1483
body:
Chapter 1483

1483 Chapter 1483-entrapping mo he

The formation appeared and the inscriptions glowed. In the depths of the valley, the Ming Lian body’s forehead glowed with golden light. Golden sword energy formed within the formation.

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

...

The golden sword radiance swept across and attacked mo he from all directions.

“Break, Break, Break!”

Mo he looked up to the sky and let out a long roar. His entire body was filled with demonic light, and his pitch-black demonic blade swept in all directions. Like an unrivaled demonic god, he had a kind of Bini’s spirit!

Wherever the demonic blade passed, the golden sword Qi collapsed.

Not far away, Lu Ming’s eyes narrowed.

Mo he had such a strong combat strength. When he fought with mo he a few days ago, mo he didn’t even use his full strength.

The combat strength that he was displaying now was extremely shocking.

Although there were only two days, the formation set up by the secondary body of inscription would not have too terrifying a power, but it should not be too much of a problem to kill a Lv 8 martial Royal realm expert.

But now, it was blocked by mo he.

“A superior earth spiritual body!”

Lu Ming’s heart stirred.

Mo he’s spiritual body should be a superior earth spiritual body. With such a body, his combat strength was extremely shocking.

In the entire Azure region, there were countless forces of various sizes, but there weren’t many upper-class earth spiritual bodies. Every one of them was a top-tier heaven’s favorite, invincible among those of the same level, and fighting against those of a higher level was as easy as eating and drinking.

“What’s the use of a formation? I’ll break your great formation!”

Mo he let out a long roar. His momentum was like a rainbow, and his demonic blade was shocking. With one slash, countless golden sword lights collapsed.

BOOM!

A demonic blade slashed at a Valley on the side. The valley trembled and crumbled. The power was shocking.

He wanted to break through the canyon and destroy Lu Ming’s array.

“Hehe, then I’ll give you another big gift!”

At this moment, dandan had already moved from Ming Lian’s secondary body to Lu Ming’s main body’s shoulder. She grinned and inscriptions flashed on her claws.

Buzzzzzz!

In the valley, another large array appeared.

This was the great formation set up by dandan.

The formation appeared and formed a huge hammer, which smashed at mo he’s face.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

As the hammer fell, mo he’s demonic blade trembled. His body also trembled and he took a few steps back.

Then, the endless sword Qi stabbed down, and the huge hammers smashed down.

Mo he’s expression was grave as he slashed out a saber radiance. However, it was cut off by the huge hammer. Under the continuous attacks, it collapsed.

“Haha, smash, smash, smash, smash this bastard to death …” No, I’ll smash this piece of sh * t to death!”

Dandan shouted arrogantly and kept waving her claws.

Mo he was finally completely suppressed. He could not fight back and could only defend passively.

Whoosh! Whoosh!

The sword Qi was everywhere. Some of them almost chopped off mo he’s head, leaving a bloody mark on his face.

A look of fear flashed across mo he’s face.

“Magical night mirror, appear!”

Mo he shouted in a low voice. A beam of light shot out from between his brows. Then, a pitch-black ancient mirror flew out and suspended above mo he’s head. It sprinkled down a beam of light and enveloped mo he.

The surrounding sword Qi and the giant hammer struck the light screen scattered by the ancient mirror. The light screen trembled, but it didn’t break.

“Holy weapon!”

Lu Ming’s gaze flickered.

The ancient mirror that mo he used was a Saint weapon.

It was normal to think about it. It was normal for a genius like mo he to have a Saint weapon to protect himself.

Mo he used his Saint weapon to protect himself, giving up his own defense and focusing on exploding.

BOOM! BOOM!

The demonic blade swept in all directions and collided with the golden sword radiance and the hammer. The two large arrays began to shake.

“Kill!”

Mo he slowly charged in one direction, breaking through the sword Qi and the hammer, and slowly approached the exit of the canyon.

If this continued, mo he would most likely escape.

it seems like I’ve underestimated the strength of a heaven’s favorite!

A thought flashed across Lu Ming’s mind, but the murderous intent in his eyes grew stronger.

“Dandan, bubble, do it!”

Lu Ming sent a voice transmission to dandan and bubbles. Then, he spread the black wings on his back and rushed towards mo he with a Swoosh.

In the process of rushing out, Lu Ming’s hands were rapidly forming seals.

“Primal Chaos sky-turning seal!”

A low roar came from Lu Ming’s mouth. A Great Seal of chaos condensed above mo he’s head. With terrifying fluctuations, it pressed down on mo he.

At the same time, dandan flew out and expanded rapidly. Just like last time, she stepped on the chaos sky-turning seal with both feet, making the power of the chaos sky-turning seal even more terrifying.

The chaos sky-turning seal pressed down on mo he with an earth-shattering force.

Mo he’s eyes narrowed. He knew the power of the chaos sky-turning seal very well. At this time, he let out an angry roar, and the pitch-black ancient mirror emitted ten thousand Zhang of demonic light, welcoming the chaos sky-turning seal.

BOOM!

With a terrifying boom, the chaos sky-turning stamp struck the pitch-black ancient mirror, causing a terrifying blast.

At this time, Lu Ming had already rushed to a place not far from mo he. His eyes suddenly shot out two black rays of light at mo he.

Godly sword technique!

The jet-black light was like a divine sword, shooting into mo he’s body and attacking his spiritual God. Mo he felt a tearing pain in his spiritual God, which made his Qi and the circulation of his true Yuan slow down.

At this moment, bubbles launched an attack. A few space-time blades slashed towards mo he.

At the same time, the two great formations, endless golden sword Qi and the huge hammer, also bombarded mo he.

BOOM! BOOM!

Mo he’s body trembled violently. Although he tried his best to resist, his defense was finally broken by so many attacks.

The scattered light from the black ancient mirror collapsed with a bang.

“Slash!”

The black wings on Lu Ming’s back were like heavenly blades. They slashed at mo he, trying to cut him in half.

Mo he’s pupils contracted sharply. At the critical moment, he moved sideways.

Puchi!

Blood splattered everywhere. Although mo he had avoided the fatal disaster, he still couldn’t completely avoid it. One of his arms was cut off by the black wing.

“Ah!”

arghh! mo he screamed with madness in his eyes. With a furious roar, the blood from his broken arm flew toward the pitch-black ancient mirror. At this moment, the mirror shone with a bright light, emitting a dark red demonic light and a terrifying power.

Lu Ming hurriedly used the black wings to shield his body. His body trembled as he was hit by the force and he was sent flying, crashing into the wall.

Similarly, the power of the chaos sky-turning seal was finally exhausted and it collapsed. It was screaming and shouting as it was sent flying.

The golden sword radiance and giant hammer that the formation had condensed were also destroyed.

“Lu Ming, I’ll remember this. The next time we meet, I’ll definitely kill you!”

A furious roar came from mo he’s mouth.

The pitch-black ancient mirror exuded a blood-red light, wrapped around mo he, and suddenly rushed out of the scope of the formation, out of the canyon, turned into a blood-red light, and fled away at an extreme speed.

“It’s a pity that the time is too short, and the power of the formation is not enough!”

Lu Ming looked in the direction where mo he had left, feeling a little regretful.

If he was given two more days to refine the second body, the power of the formation would be even stronger, and he would definitely be able to kill mo he.
